a.xlink:title:
eya_def_tools.data_models.spatial.Location
Specification of a horizontal location in space.
Attributes: x (float): Location x-coordinate (typically easing). y (float): Location y-coordinate (typically northing).

eya_def_tools.data_models.wind_farm.OperationalRestriction
Specifications of a restriction that limits power output.
In the current draft of the schema, 'label', 'description' and 'comments' fields are available to describe the restriction with free text. This is intended to be expanded into a more comprehensive data model.
Attributes: label (str): Short label to indicate the type of operational restriction. description (Optional[str]): Optional description of the operational restriction. Default is None. comments (Optional[str]): Optional comments on the operational restriction. Default is None.

eya_def_tools.data_models.wind_farm.TurbineConfiguration
Specification of all details for a turbine configuration.
Attributes: id (str): Unique identifier of the turbine. label (Optional[str]): Label of the turbine, if different from the 'id'. Default is None. description (Optional[str]): Optional description of the turbine. Default is None. comments (Optional[str]): Optional comments on the turbine. Default is None. location (Location): The horizontal spatial location of the turbine. ground_level_altitude (float): The ground level altitude (base elevation) of the turbine (in m). hub_height (float): The hub height of the turbine (in m). turbine_model_id (str): Unique identifier of the turbine model. operational_lifetime_start_date (Optional[date]): Operational lifetime start date of the individual turbine (format YYYY-MM-DD). Default is None. operational_lifetime_end_date (Optional[date]): Operational lifetime end date of the individual turbine (format YYYY-MM-DD). Default is None. restrictions (Optional[list[OperationalRestriction]]): List of operational restrictions at the turbine level. Default is None.

eya_def_tools.data_models.wind_farm.WindFarmConfiguration
A collection of wind turbines considered as one unit (plant).
Attributes: id (str): Unique identifier of the wind farm. label (str): Label or name of the wind farm. abbreviation (Optional[str]): Optional abbreviated label of the wind farm. Default is None. description (Optional[str]): Optional description of the wind farm. Default is None. comments (Optional[str]): Optional comments on the wind farm. Default is None. turbines (list[TurbineConfiguration]): List of specifications for constituent turbines. relevance (WindFarmRelevance(StrEnum)): The relevance of the wind farm for the assessment ('internal', 'external' or 'future'). operational_lifetime_start_date (date): Operational lifetime start date of the wind farm (format YYYY-MM-DD). operational_lifetime_end_date (Optional[date]): Operational lifetime end date of the wind farm (format YYYY-MM-DD). Default is None. installed_capacity (float): The maximum production (in MW) of the wind farm under typical conditions. If there are features in place to increase power output beyond the stated nameplate power of the turbines (e.g. so-called power boost solutions), the wind farm installed capacity should correspond to that increased power, insofar as is reached under typical conditions and not only in rare exceptions. export_capacity (Optional[float]): The maximum permanently transmittable power (in MW) from the wind farm at the grid connection, or equivalent. Default is None. restrictions (Optional[list[OperationalRestriction]]): List of operational restrictions at the wind farm level. Default is None.
